channel.title: IODC 2018 (Buenos Aires) - 27-28 September (call for proposals ends 1 April)
channel.description:
Just flagging that [calls for proposals for IODC18](https://www.opendatacon.org/call-for-proposals.html) end on 1st April.
There's specific mention of International Aid and Humanitarian Relief in the Impact Track, but IATI should be applicable to other areas
Is anyone considering a proposal? Perhaps there could be a coordinated community effort.....

item.title: IODC 2018 (Buenos Aires) - 27-28 September (call for proposals ends 1 April)
item.dc:creator: YohannaLoucheur
item.description:
Bringing this up. It would really be awesome to see proposals that integrate IATI data!

Read full topic
item.source: IODC 2018 (Buenos Aires) - 27-28 September (call for proposals ends 1 April)
